title: Pork Tenderloin Medallions and Balsamic Reduction
directions: Heat oil in a small saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add shallots and garlic; sauté 2 minutes.
Add vinegar and next 3 ingredients; cook until reduced to ½ cup.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Sprinkle pork with salt and pepper.
Place pork in pan; cook 2 minutes on each side.
Add balsamic reduction; cook 1 minute, turning pork to coat.
Yield 4 servings (3 pork medallions & 2 Tbsp reduction)
ingredients: ½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
